item.description:
Join us on Saturday May 15 for lunch at Pickity Place in Mason, NH...This is such a fun place to have lunch..The May menu consists of bourbon beef medallions over roquefort crustini with spring greens from their own gardens. There is also a vegetarian menu.. You can access the particulars on this quaint place hidden away in a country hillside by going to their website.
Their is also a very nice gift shop in the old barn and it is fun to walk around the gardens which is where they get a lot of the food you eat there. I have been before and it is such a great place to enjoy the new springtime.
The cost is $18.95+tax.
I would like to keep this to about 5 folks as this is not a big place and to eat out in the sunroom requires a smaller group..So, if you are interested please let me know and be sure you want to go...I will have a waitlist but please do not sign up unless you are sure you would be going.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Lunch at Pickity Place in Mason, NH
